{{See also|Chasm Exploration Team Camp}}
The '''Chasm Exploration Team''' is a group of individuals hired by the [[Ministry of Civil Affairs]] to investigate anomalies in [[The Chasm (Subregion)|The Chasm]].

They are the focus of [[The Chasm Delvers]] [[World Quest]] series. After the events of The Chasm Delvers, [[Muning]] decides to make the group an official part of [[Huishan Hall]].

==Members==
* [[Zhiqiong]] &mdash; Adventurer
* [[Khedive]] &mdash; Ecologist
* [[Jinwu]] &mdash; Safety Technician, The Chasm
* [[Taliesin]] &mdash; Bard
* [[Clitopho]] &mdash; Former Treasure Hoarder

==Trivia==
* According to [[Jinwu]], [[Klee]] was supposed to join the team as the demolitions expert along with [[Kaeya]] as her partner, but was unable to attend because she got grounded after carelessly blowing up the stove at [[Good Hunter]]. With no other options left, [[Clitopho]] was drafted into the team as the demolitions expert after being rescued from the [[Treasure Hoarders]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Heavenly Stone's Debris}}</ref>
